Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27406 affecting package freetype for versions less than 2.12.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-27406 affecting package freetype for versions less than 2.12.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package freetype is earlier than 2.12.1-1, affected by CVE-2022-27406
